item.title: Demo Notebook
item.description: I wanted to start integrating jupyter notebooks into github and this website, so I started with this post.

item.title: Testing this method
item.description: Here is an example of how you can use the ipynb shortcode in your markdown: Replace "path/to/notebook.ipynb" with the actual path to your notebook file.
